attributes.action: ban all building on designated flood plains.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As can be seen by the current flood situation we need more designated areas to be set aside as flood plains and not allow ANY building on such areas. We need the prime minister to legislate to prevent ANY building on these areas.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
